updates.title: Ethos Launcher V2 Released
updates.content: Modular configuration, XP tracking, and deeper Farcaster integration now live.

updates.title: Community Codes Expanded
updates.content: New codes sent to active contributors via onchain mentions and X replies.

updates.title: EchoOS Beta Online
updates.content: The community-driven hub for EthOS updates is now live at echoos.xyz.
